content: {"name": "Cothoa Luncheon Club - Senior Citizen Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.nyconnects.ny.gov/providers/cothoa-luncheon-club-inc-sofanysp1085", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2005 Amsterdam Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10032", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8342672, "longitude": -73.94078800000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 781-6580", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must show proof of age over 60 yrs old"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
